mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART ( cart_num, id, item_num, cart_count ) VALUES ( cart_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{itemNum}, #{cartCount} )
mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM as rNum, C.cart_num as cartNum, C.id, C.item_num as itemNum, C.add_date as addDate, C.cart_count as cartCount, I.item_name as itemName, I.item_price as itemPrice, I.item_img as itemImg FROM CART C INNER JOIN ITEMS I ON C.item_num = I.item_num WHERE C.id = #{id}
